SAINT.Name: 42 Martyrs of Ammoria in Phrygia (+ c.845): Theodore, Constantine, Aetius, Theophilus, Basoes, Callistus, and others
Monkmartyr Conon and his son Conon of Iconium (+ 270-275)
Holy Hierarchs Evagrius the Confessor, Patriarch of Constantinople
Holy Hierarch Taranius, Bishop of Antioch
Venerable Job, in Schema Joshua, of Anzer (+ 1720)
Finding of the Precious Cross and the Precious Nails by the Holy Empress Helen in Jerusalem (326)
Icons of the Mother of God: 'Chenstokhov' (1st C), 'Blessed Heaven' (14th C) and 'Shestokovskoy' (18th C)
